name: The Fee
description:
You play as a guardian of the Neuron Lord to acquire energy need to support his living process.

Run through the haunted human bunker and upgrade yourself fully.

--------------------

Arrows - Move

Z - Jump

X - Slash

Shift - Sprint (after acquiring legs)

Z, Z - Double jump (after acquiring body)

ESC - Ascend (after acquiring stable mind)

--------------------

First game made by BushStudio.
